channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipped mattress amongst other fly tipped materials, bins overflowing and rubbish pilling up in and around Leyland Road junction of Eltham road., 22nd October
item.description:
Fly tipped mattress and materials plus excessive piles of built up rubbish for a number of weeks creating a fire hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leyland Road, Blackheath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole Street of lights not working AGAIN, 22nd October
item.description:
This is the 3rd time in 2 months that the street lights have stopped coming on in the evening. Please can this issue be properly looked into, with the nights getting darker earlier, this is a massive health and safety concern.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37,38, Anchor And Hope Lane, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on street, 22nd October
item.description:
Someone dumped this rubbish at my door. Needs to be removed please. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greening Street, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Broken Fence, 22nd October
item.description:
Part of the boundary fence enclosing Edgebury Fields is broken and collapsing. If this is not rectified, then this land owned by LBB, currently enclosed and designated for woodland development, may become subject to encroachment by persons looking for land to settle ie. caravan owning communities. Please repair ASAP. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 105-111, Slades Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On Double Yellow Lines, 22nd October
item.description:
Corner of Haselbury Road and Cheddington Road. This driver has left his/her car on top of double yellow lines and on a corner of 2 roads. Car arrived at just after 20:00hrs this evening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheddington Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The paving slab is very loose, 22nd October
item.description:
When you step on one side of the paving slab, it rocks down about 10cm and someone could be really injured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxford Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 125 Iverson Road/Maygrove Road crossing., 22nd October
item.description:
The Zebra crossing on mangrove road to and from West Hampstead road is insufficient. We moved into the area in April and in that short time there have been 4 instances where drivers have sped through the crossing whilst we've been walking on the crossing. There needs to either be speed humps put in to slow cars (we constantly see cars speed in this section trying to get through to Kilburn Road. Or the crossing needs to be moved further down the road. Its only a matter of time before a car speeds through and kills someone, which being a popular crossing for the local school would be a tragedy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 160-176, Maygrove Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 22nd October
item.description:
Lighting has been off for over a month Number appears to be 2831 03

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckarmans Wood, Dulwich, London

item.title: Crossing, 22nd October
item.description:
Very dangerous crossing. Cars speed through and do not stop, almost killed tonight as dark and cars speed around the corner. Crossing needs better lighting, to be moved or speed bump added to slow down cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 120-162, Maygrove Road, West Hampstead, London

item.title: Garden waste dumped outside 19 & 21 Forburg Road, 22nd October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forburg Road, Hackney, London

item.title: The road behind the car wash, 22nd October
item.description:
Missing double yellow lines. Extremely narrow single lane road where cars are constantly parking and creating problems for vehicles behind and pedestrians walking by as they cover the pavement too. Should be limited to loading/unloading during business hours.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 139, St Pancras Way, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A group of boys aged between 13-14 were slingshotting birds mainly parakeets and were extremely cocky and said thahe had killed another 6 somewhere else, 22nd October
item.description:
There was 6 of them all a similar age some of them using a slingshot and stone to kill the birds
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Paint spillage at 10 Thornton Street SW9 6AG. The paint is on double yellow lines and the paint follows up the road due to tyre treads., 22nd October
item.description:
I like to report to report paint spillage at 10 Thornton Street SW9 6AG. The paint has left white tyre tracks up the road. The paint has recently been there. Please can the paint spill and the paint tracks be gently removed. Whatever can be done would be greatly appreciated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 290, Brixton Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recurring flytipping from Stephen House, 1B Darnley Road, 22nd October
item.description:
Neighbours on Darnley Road have been reporting this issue for months - fines need to be issued and the problem resolved. Ongoing flytipping of commercial waste on Darnley Road near Mare Street from Stephen House, 1B and C Darnley Road commercial units.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and bed frame, 22nd October
item.description:
X2 mattress left on street and bed frame left ok side of street. Moved out of the way and near the bins. Please clean away, been there for 2 weeks now and was obstructing path- so taken in and out neatly beside the big communal bins
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Monteagle Way, Hackney, London
